snippet: Boston beat Pittsburgh, 3-2, and the last eight meetings between the teams have been decided by one goal.
abstract: Boston Bruins beat Pittsburgh Penguins, 3-2 in NHL action; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Boston beat Pittsburgh, 3-2, and the last eight meetings between the teams have been decided by one goal.

headline.main: Bruins’ Overtime Win Against Penguins Extends a Streak
headline.print_headline: Bruins’ Overtime Win Against Penguins Extends a Streak
